products.name: Benefiance Overnight Wrinkle Resisting Cream
products.description: A rich, restorative night cream that visibly improves wrinkles overnight.* Deeply hydrates featuring Hyaluronic Acid while smoothing and restoring skin while you sleep.
products.composition:
TENCHA R.E.M, composed of Super Bio-Hyaluronic Acid, Rubus Leaf Extract, and Yarrow Extract, supports the natural skin repairing process during the night to help prevent and improve the appearance of wrinkles caused by lack of sleep.
ReNeura Technology+™ features Natsume and Active Response Powder Ashitaba to help improve skin receptivity to awaken and maintain the effectiveness of your treatment over time.
KOMBU-Bounce Complex: Formulated with green, brown, and red algae which helps address the look of wrinkles.
Niacinamide: Fortifies skin's barrier and smooths skin's texture.

- Use in the evening as the last step of your skincare routine.
- Scoop two pearl-sized drops with the enclosed spatula and place on face (cheeks, forehead, nose, chin).

products.how_to_use:
- Clarifying Cleansing Foam: Use daily as your first skincare step. Wet skin and lather a pearl-sized amount between fingers. Massage over face with gentle circular motions, and rinse.
- Ultimune Power Infusing Serum: Use in the morning and evening after cleansing and before moisturizing. Dispense onto fingertips and smooth evenly over face and neck.
- Benefiance Wrinkle Smoothing Cream: In the morning and evening, dot the cream onto the 5 points of your face. Gently smooth outward over your face. Apply an additional pearl-sized amount to your neck, and sweep the cream upward across your jawline.
- Benefiance Wrinkle Smoothing Eye Cream: Use in the morning and evening. Dot a pearl-sized amount around the eye area and gently massage under the eye as well as around the lid and brow bone.

products.how_to_use:
Use at night, after cleanser and essence or softener.
For first time use: Apply every two days (6 applications over 12 days)
For ongoing use: Apply once a week to maintain results (6 applications over 6 weeks)
Contents:
1 blue pouch containing:
• 1 clickable container filled with serum (6 applications)
• 1 clickable container cap
6 silver pouches, each containing:
• 1 micro-point applicator (disposable, including cap)
Preparation:
Assembly
1. Twist the clickable container cap off.
2. Remove the micro-point applicator from the silver pouch. Use within 30 minutes, as micro-point applicator tips are vulnerable to humidity. Twist the clickable container onto the applicator.
3. Pull the cap off.
Before using, to deliver serum to your skin, first drain air from the container by holding it upward with the micro-point applicator on top, and clicking the pushbutton about 30-40 times.
Important: Drain air from the applicator before each use (about 30 clicks).
Usage
Press the micro-point applicator firmly against your skin, so it is pushed slightly inward. Click the button to deliver the serum. Move the position of the applicator little by little, clicking each time. Repeat on different areas, for a total of 50 clicks. Do not click more than 50 times per use. Blend remaining serum on the skin surface into your skin.
After Usage
Cap the micro-point applicator and discard after use.
Re-place cap onto clickable container.
For micro-point applicator:
Use with clean hands.
Use applicator immediately after removing from pouch. Do not leave out.
Discard after use. Do not reuse.
Caution:
Do not use on eyelids, eyelid lining, or eye surface.
Store away from direct sunlight and high temperatures.
Use on facial skin only.
Keep out of reach of children.
See frequently asked questions here

Shiseido's unique and ultra-advanced 18 micro-point applicator with PreciseDelivery Technology enables skin to receive effective ingredients more precisely through mechanical stimulation for intensified benefits.

products.name: Facial Cotton Mini Size
products.description: Each square contains a blend of 123,000 cotton fibers, woven into 28 layers with high moisture-absorbing and releasing properties for less wasted product. Adds a gentle exfoliation benefit to improve skin roughness. Specially crafted to maintain its shape so that fibers don't fluff or stick to face.
products.how_to_use:
To apply softener,
- Pour softener onto the cotton pad after cleansing.
- Wrap the cotton around the inner middle finger, between the index and ring fingers.
- Starting from the center of the face, use outward strokes to smooth softener:
- across the forehead
- from nose to cheeks
- around your lips
- upward from your chest to neck
- under your chin
To remove eye makeup,
- Pour makeup remover onto 3 cotton pads - one for each eye and a third for your eyelashes.
- Rest a cotton pad over each lid and hold it in place for a few seconds. Then gently wipe downward and off skin.
- Place the remaining cotton pad onto the lashes of each eye. Hold it in place for a few seconds to break down the mascara, then wipe from the base to the tip of your eyelashes, starting from outer to inner corner and back again. Repeat on your other eye.
- Follow with cleanser.
features: Each square contains a blend of 123,000 cotton fibers, woven into 28 layers with high moisture-absorbing and releasing properties for less wasted product
Adds a gentle exfoliation benefit to improve skin roughness
Specially crafted to maintain its shape so that fibers don't fluff or stick to face.

- Apply twice daily, in the morning and evening.
- Scoop two rice-sized amounts and blend between ring fingers. Smooth the cream around your entire eye and lip areas.
- Use your ring fingers to gently massage the cream in a circular motion around each eye. Repeat 6 times.

products.how_to_use:
>
- Apply twice daily, in morning and evening.
- Place one pump of serum into the palm of your hand and blend into the skin, starting in the center of the face and using upward strokes.
- Dispense another pump into hands and sweep upward from the base of the neck to the jawline.
- For added benefits: Gently smooth the serum outward over the face and then along your jawline. Place both thumbs under the jawline and apply upward pressure starting below the chin and ending below the ears. Repeat this motion 6 times. Then, holding 4 fingers together, press the pointer fingers parallel to your nasolabial folds—or laugh lines. Then tilt fingers so they lie flat onto skin and sweep them upward towards the temples, pulling the nasolabial folds taut. Lift and repeat 6 times.
- For Refill: Remove refill cap. Twist and remove empty, inner bottle from reusable outer bottle. Insert refill into the outer container, and twist until firmly in place. Discard refill cap.
features: A rich, dewy serum with firming benefits for a brighter complexion.

products.name: SHISEIDO Facial Cotton
products.description: 100% natural, super-soft cotton pads for gentle exfoliation, makeup removal, cleansing and toning.
products.how_to_use:
To apply softener or essence,
- Pour softener or essence onto the cotton pad after cleansing.
- Wrap the cotton around the inner middle finger, between the index and ring fingers.
- Starting from the center of the face, use outward strokes to smooth softener:
- across the forehead
- from nose to cheeks
- around your lips
- upward from your chest to neck
- under your chin
To remove eye makeup,
- Pour makeup remover onto 3 cotton pads - one for each eye and a third for your eyelashes.
- Rest a cotton pad over each lid and hold it in place for a few seconds. Then gently wipe downward and off skin.
- Place the remaining cotton pad onto the lashes of each eye. Hold it in place for a few seconds to break down the mascara, then wipe from the base to the tip of your eyelashes, starting from outer to inner corner and back again. Repeat on your other eye.
- Follow with cleanser.
features: 100% natural, super-soft cotton pads for gentle exfoliation, makeup removal, cleansing and toning.

products.how_to_use:
- Apply morning and evening, after cleansing.
- Take 2 pearl-sized drops with the enclosed spatula and place on 5 areas of the face (cheeks, forehead, nose, and chin).
- Smooth gently over the face, starting in the larger areas such as the cheeks and forehead. Spread from the center of the face outward, and then along the jawline.
- Apply upward pressure along the jawline with both thumbs, starting below the chin and ending below the ears. Repeat 6 times.
- Hold four fingers together, placing the pointer fingers along the nasolabial folds (laugh lines).
- Move upward toward the temples, pulling the nasolabial folds open, with palms flat on the cheeks. Lift, and repeat 6 times.
For Refill:
- Open the cap. Hold the jar with one hand and use the other to gently pull out the refill by holding the two tabs.
- Insert the new refill, pushing it firmly into the jar.
- Discard the inner sticker and close the cap firmly.

products.how_to_use:
- Apply morning and evening, after cleansing.
- Take 2 pearl-sized drops with the enclosed spatula and place on 5 areas of the face (cheeks, forehead, nose, and chin).
- Smooth gently over the face, starting in the larger areas such as the cheeks and forehead. Spread from the center of the face outward, and then along the jawline.
- Apply upward pressure along the jawline with both thumbs, starting below the chin and ending below the ears. Repeat 6 times.
- Hold four fingers together, placing the pointer fingers along the nasolabial folds (laugh lines).
- Move upward toward the temples, pulling the nasolabial folds open, with palms flat on the cheeks. Lift, and repeat 6 times.
